Double integrals and partial derivatives? Definitely enough maths, justify your maths and explain it thoroughly. In fact partial derivatives, double integrals and cyclic integrals are beyond the syllabus itself. But remember that quality of maths is only 6 marks out of 20, if you perfect all the other criteria and do OKAY in maths you can still get a 3 or 4 out of 6 and end up with a 17 or 16 which is REALLY good.
